trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies an endpoint that issues a security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態項目，指定發行安全性權杖的端點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersEndpointAddressElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersEndpointAddressElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of binding to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用的繫結的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type must have a registered configuration section in order to be referenced.
trans-unit.target: 類型必須有註冊的組態區段，才能加以參考。

trans-unit.source: The type is registered by section name, rather than by the type name of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 此類型註冊以區段名稱，而不是由繫結的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of binding to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的繫結的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the binding configuration to use when the endpoint is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在產生端點時所使用的繫結組態的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration must be in scope when the endpoint is defined.
trans-unit.target: 繫結組態必須在範圍內定義的端點。

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration must be in scope when the endpoint is defined.
trans-unit.target: 繫結組態必須在範圍內定義的端點。

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding configuration to use when the endpoint is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 要在產生端點時所使用的繫結組態的名稱。
